snippet: The standard-bearer for compact-sedan performance has grown wider and wedgier, as well as quicker and more efficient.
abstract: The standard-bearer for compact-sedan performance has grown wider and wedgier, as well as quicker and more efficient.
lead_paragraph: What is it? Need we ask? America's most popular Bimmer, beloved of freshly minted lawyers, gets its official world premiere in Detroit. (It was previewed online in October.)

headline.main: 2012 BMW 3 Series: The Bavarian Sport Sedan Drops Cylinders and Gains Speed
